Package com.example.mini_pekkas.ui.home

Class OrganizerHomeViewModel

java.lang.Object
androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
com.example.mini_pekkas.ui.home.OrganizerHomeViewModel
public class OrganizerHomeViewModel extends androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
ViewModel for the Organizer Home Fragment. Handles retrieving and updating events from Firebase for organizers.
